summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2963, for the improvement of Michigan Street, from 1st Avenue South to Corson Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading, planking, constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary cross walks; providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35728 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
